item.description:
"Keep'm separated - Using PHP to isolate content, application and presentation layers".

PHP meetup will review two tools aimed to simplify your [programming] life:

Smarty, a "Template/Presentation Framework" that provides a wealth of tools to automate tasks commonly dealt with at the presentation layer of an application (i.e. quick and painless development and deployment).

Neptune Web Edit (NWE) a new, open source web content management solution that lets non-technical maintain their own web sites (i.e. clean project hand-off to the client); similar to Macromedia Contribute, but for the web.


We've got lots of good stuff to cover so we're going to start promptly at 6:00 and end at 8:00.
